title: Service disruption due to power fault

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Due to a power fault, there is no train svcs between #JurongEast and #Marsiling. Free regular bus svcs & free bridging bus svcs are available between #JurongEast and #Woodlands. For alternative travel options, please refer to https://t.co/H0JXeZvUHA
